improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero may occur in line 10 because y can be 0. Add a check to ensure y is not 0 before the division.

The code has a potential division by zero error on line 10 if y evaluates to 0. This can happen during the for loop iterations, based on how x and y change. Consider adding a check (e.g., an if statement) to handle cases where y is 0.

The loop runs 49 times, and the variable x is updated in each iteration.  At the end of the loop, x will be -49. In this case y will be 0 and division by zero will occur in line 10. Add a check to ensure y is not 0 before the division.
